title: The Blade of Frontiers
content:
Mizora, who was pleased to find that he had slain Karlach. She rewarded him for his obedience and departed - though it seems likely we'll meet her again.

If you listened to Wyll and slayed Karlach as he said, then Mizora will show up and reward Wyll with an Infernal Robe, while revealing that she had deceived him about Karlach.

After Mizora leaves. speak to Wyll to continue. He will talk about how he was meant to hunt devils and demons instead of innocent tieflings like Karlach. You will have
